lines: I see a journey, a journey full of events.
Miracles and misdeeds, rejoice and despair...
But pay no heed to my rambling words, my dear coachman.
You must make a decision. I can see that.
Choose wisely, and the way will be made smooth for you.
options: Promise a place in your carriage

lines: Thank you. I shall see you on board.
I see pain and suffering in your future. And death.
